summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department, authorizing extension for the term July 1, 1971 through June 30, 1973, of an agreement authorized by Ordinance 99449 with the State of Washington, Washington State Patrol, for establishment of a crime laboratory in the Public Safety Building, increasing the compensation of the Police Department Laboratory Director in connection therewith, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
